charges.charge_description: 18:2314.F SCHEME TO DEFRAUD: MONEY, STATE TAX STAMPS-conspire to devise a scheme and artifice to defraud and to obtain money and property by means of false and fraudulent pretenses by use of the mails and interstate wire communication (18:371) (1)

18:659.F INTERSTATE OR FOREIGN SHIPMENT BY CARRIER-did knowingly embezzle, steal, unlawfully take and conceal hot tubs which were constituted an interstate shipment of freight and property with intent to convert to his own use. (2)
18:2314.F SCHEME TO DEFRAUD: MONEY, STATE TAX STAMPS-did knowingly transport stolen hot tubs from Mississippi to Tennessee. (3)

18:1343.F FRAUD BY WIRE, RADIO, OR TELEVISION-did cause to be transmitted by means of wire communication in interstate commerce, reported the alleged theft of trailer and interstate shipment. (18:2 aided &; abetted) (4)

18:2314.F SCHEME TO DEFRAUD: MONEY, STATE TAX STAMPS-conspire to devise a scheme and artifice to defraud and to obtain money and property by means of false and fraudulent pretenses by use of the mails and interstate wire communication (18:371) (1)

18:1343.F FRAUD BY WIRE, RADIO, OR TELEVISION-did cause to be transmitted by means of wire communication in interstate commerce, reported the alleged theft of trailer and interstate shipment (18:2 aided &; abetted) (4)
